short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display & Export Your Prelim & Final Schedule

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the Cornell Exam Schedule Viewer, a seamless Chrome extension designed to enhance your academic experience at Cornell University. Effortlessly stay on top of your Prelim and Final exams with this standalone, compact extension integrated directly into the registrar's website.

https://cornellexam.vercel.app/

Visualize your exam schedule with ease through a convenient calendar view. Quickly navigate and plan your study sessions efficiently.

üîÑ Export to Calendar:
With just a click of a button, effortlessly export your exam schedule directly to your preferred calendar application. Stay organized and sync your academic commitments seamlessly.

üìö Course Management:
Easily manage your courses across various webpages. The Cornell Exam Schedule Viewer streamlines the process, providing you with a user-friendly interface to keep track of your academic responsibilities.

üåê Standalone & Integrated:
This tiny extension is designed to be unobtrusive yet highly functional. Enjoy the benefits of a standalone tool seamlessly integrated within the registrar's website, providing you with a cohesive and efficient user experience.

Never miss a deadline and optimize your study routine with the Cornell Exam Schedule Viewer. Download now and empower your academic journey!
